Text:
This was a request, remember. If you want a game uploaded, just request. I will seed indefinitely. Next upload: System Shock 1

Thanks
DOS-Carey
Is it a bit pointless to upload all these dos games people can easily find in direct download in abandonware websites ? just a thought
oooh bn looking for this for years!! hope i get thru the installation ;)

Never pointless.

Syndicate = YEARS ahead of EVE mmo when it comes to - log in (start game), set skills, GO AFK for years, come back and PRESTO!  GOD hood!

Love this game!
